data.title: Texas Cities by Population (2024)
data.meta_description: Get a list of Texas cities by population based on Census 2023 data.
data.text:
The most populated cities in Texas are Houston with 2,314,157, San Antonio at 1,495,295, Dallas with 1,302,868, Austin at 979,882, and Fort Worth with 978,468. You can get the most current Census population data for all 1,799 Texas cities, sorted from the most populous cities in Texas to the least, according to the 2023 Population Estimates Program and 2022 American Community Survey.

Sure, you can copy this list right into your favorite spreadsheet tool. Or save yourself formatting headaches and grab the latest Texas cities population data as a ready-to-use Excelâ„¢ file below. It's time to stop searching and start digging into data!
